document_data.name: Sheva Whitefeather
document_data.mainbody: '''Sheva Whitefeather''' was the ranking [[Wychlaran|witch]] of [[Mulsantir]]. She was one of the few [[Othlor]]s of that organization.
document_data.Activities: Sheva gave an adventurer the chance to fight for their life against [[Okku]] instead of simply allowing them to be sacrificed to save the city, allowing them to recruit followers from the Mulsantir jail.<ref>
